name: Sparky Marky
description:
Explore an abandoned children's recreational camp and uncover the dark secrets covered up by its founders. Find clues and apply specific commands in the Discord channel to find out what truly happened. But be careful: Sparky has been activated and the monster inside of it never sleeps…

Key features:
  • Explore the abandoned children's camp
  • Find clues and uncover the mystery
  • Collect gadgets and use them to progress
  • Escape from Sparky

Your journey doesn’t end there! Join our Discord server, use your collected clues to interact with the dedicated #susie-commands channel and uncover more mysteries! Some of them might even give you a clue to your next thrilling adventure…
